transcript.text: I think it's a tragedy and a catastrophe
that the left uh has been has accepted
the idea of humans as uh historical
products simply reflections of their
environment because what follows from
that of course is that there's no moral
barrier to molding them any way you like
I mean if humans have no inner nature if
they don't have an inner Instinct for
Freedom you know if it's not fundamental
to their nature to have free creative
productive work under their own control
if that's not part of their nature then
why you know there's no advant there's
no moral reason for allowing them that
space you can just mold them into being
what you think they ought to be and you
can be the Central Committee or you can
be the U you know the the managers of
the corporation or uh the directors of a
fascist state or whatever
[Music]
